question: What will be the price of Sui (SUI/USD) on [DATE]?
description: Predict Sui's price at market resolution. Current price: $[CURRENT_PRICE]
resolutionCriteria:
This market resolves using the Sui (SUI/USD) price reported by CoinGecko at [TIME] UTC on [DATE].

The final price will be scaled to 2 decimal places (cents) for settlement.
Only the CoinGecko API will be used as the data source.
In case of any downtime, the last available price before resolution will be used.
Market range: $[MIN_VALUE_FORMATTED] - $[MAX_VALUE_FORMATTED]
_comment_image: Optional: Upload image first using POST /api/markets/upload-image, then add the URL and key here
